text: Martinus Johannes "Martin" Konings (15 March 1929 â€“ 28 July 2020) was a Dutch Labour politician. He was a member of the House of Representatives between 1973 and 1986. He was born in 's-Hertogenbosch, Netherlands. Konings died on 28 July 2020 in Maastricht, Netherlands at the age of 91. ==References== == Other websites == * Bio at Parlement.com Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Labour Party (Netherlands) politicians Category:People from 's-Hertogenbosch Category:Politicians from North Brabant
title: Martin Konings
